data.name: Capitalization !!!!
data.description:
Capitalization is writing a word with its first letter as a capital letter. our task in this kata is to capitalize the given word.

Sample :: input >- Output :: 

"apple" >- "Apple" .

"demonstration" >- "Demonstration" .

"local" >- "Local" .

play by the rules : 

1- Note, that during capitalization all the letters except the first one remains unchanged.

2- Vector as header file and its functions are disabled . 

 Please , I beg your pardon , if there are any Question concerning the kata Post it as suggestion or question but not isuue , Thanks in advance .
 
 and if any know how to add random tests Please Leave a comment m Thanks for any Contribution .
 
 Hope You Enjoy the kata .. Keep on Learning .
